column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=My son in law cuts my hair .
#text=He texts me to come and get a haircut .
#text=I go to the upscale salon and get the royal treatment .
#text=It starts with me remembering how to get there easily .
#text=It is downtown and they are all one way streets and canyons .
#text=I find my lucky parking spot and go around the corner into the salon and am greeted .
#text=I see my son in - law and says '' `` go get a smock '' '' .
#text=I went into the little room , picked out a black smock and put on and sit down .
#text=He colors the hair , I sit under the dryer .
#text=We wash the hair , I get back in the chair and he cuts it .
#text=The whole thing takes a couple of hours .
#text=I always feel so beautiful on the way home .
